text: Matouš the Cobbler (Czech: O ševci Matoušovi) is a 1948 Czechoslovak drama film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars Ladislav Pešek, Vladimír Řepa, Jaroslav Průcha, and Josef Kemr. ==References== ==External links== *Matouš the Cobbler (O ševci Matoušovi) at the Internet Movie Database Category:1948 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Czechoslovak drama films Category:Czech- language films Category:Czech films Category:1948 drama films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:Czechoslovak black-and-white films
title: Matouš the Cobbler
